baseline_texts: The frame shows a hand holding a white envelope. The envelope is positioned with its back side facing up, displaying the flap. The background features a white desk with a white rectangular object, possibly a closed laptop or a tablet, sitting on the desk. The lighting appears to be indoor and well-lit.

The scene appears to be a clean and well-lit workspace.

There is also a white wireless router or modem device with indicator lights resting on the same white surface just above the switch. The environment looks clean and minimalistic.

In the upper part of the frame, there is a flat, white rectangular device, possibly a wireless charger or a power bank. The overall setting appears to be minimalistic and clean.

In front of the hand, there is a small white object or box with black text and a barcode or striped design on it. In the background, there is a larger white rectangular device or object, possibly a power bank or a small electronic gadget. The overall setting is clean and minimalistic.

diff_texts: Initial frame. No previous frame to compare.
The envelope is being opened in the current frame; the flap is lifted up compared to the previous frame where it was closed. The hand is pulling the flap upwards to reveal the inside of the envelope.
The main object, a paper airplane, has been folded further and is now being held flat on the table by the hand. The hand's position changed from gripping the airplane to pressing it down.
The main object, a white card-like item with black stripes, was flipped from its vertical position to lying flat on the surface, and the hand adjusted its position to hold the card flat.
The hand moved slightly to the right, causing the barcode label to lift up from the surface.
The hand moved slightly to the right, and the fingers are more spread out in the current frame compared to the previous one.
The main object, a small rectangular booklet or card, is being lifted and tilted upwards by the hand, creating a diagonal motion compared to its previous flat position on the table.
The card that was previously being held and flipped by the hand in the first frame is now standing upright on the desk in the second frame. The hand is no longer visible.
